hints.content:
The tick marks represent $\dfrac14$ on the number line.  

$\pink{A}$ is located at the $3^{\text{rd}}$ tick mark to the *left* of $0$, so $\pink{A}=\pink{-\dfrac34}$.
We can see that $\blue{B}$ is located at $\blue0$ on the number line.
$\green{C}$ is located at the $5^{\text{th}}$ tick mark to the *right* of $0$, so $\green{C}={\dfrac54}=1\dfrac14=\green{1.25}$.

The following cards match each point:  

![](https://ka-perseus-images.s3.amazonaws.com/69e2de2ec7418e29b6581771b2562ceb0fc57b40.png)

[[☃ matcher 1]]

hints.content:
The tick marks represent $\dfrac14$ on the number line.  


$\pink{A}$ is located at the $5^{\text{th}}$ tick mark to the *left* of $0$, so $\pink{A}=\pink{-\dfrac54}$.
$\blue{B}$ is halfway between $0$ and $-1$, so $\blue{B}$ equals $-\dfrac12$ or $\blue{-0.5}$.
We can see that $\green{C}$ is located at $\green2$ on the number line.

The following cards match each point:  

![](https://ka-perseus-images.s3.amazonaws.com/7052632393790eec27a335d6f1e4b6137267dc39.png)

hints.content:
The tick marks represent $\dfrac1{4}$ on the number line.  

$\pink{A}$ is located at the $3^{\text{rd}}$ tick mark to the *left* of $-5$, so $\pink{A}={-5\dfrac34}=\pink{-5.75}$.
$\blue{B}$ is located at the $2^{\text{nd}}$ tick mark to the *left* of $-5$, so $\blue{B}=-5\dfrac24=\blue{-5\dfrac12}$.
$\green{C}$ is located at the $1^{\text{st}}$ tick mark to the *left* of $-4$, so $\green{C}=\green{-4\dfrac14}$.

The following cards match each point:  

![](https://ka-perseus-images.s3.amazonaws.com/81ba0cd809b3b4eead16c147700619fb289ed1d1.png)

hints.content:
Let's fill in the missing whole numbers on the number line.

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/ff14d38290c833d39d94c9ed075ad7fe070488fc)
$\blueD{B}$ is located between $-8$ and $-9$. So, $\blueD{B}$ is less than $-8$ but greater than $-9$.
A reasonable value for point $\blueD{B}$ is $-8.45$.
